about_the_game:
Phantom Squad is a top-down shooter, with heavy emphasis on tactics; either fighting solo, or as a team of 2-4 players, strategize, adapt, and triumph together against relentless adversaries across a series of intense levels.
Betrayed, left for dead, marked down as KIA... you are now ghosts. You are now the Phantom Squad; obeying now laws, no jurisdiction, with no allegiances besides those of your teammates.

Plan Your Assault


Use voice chat and in-game tools to come up with your best short term plan. Think sharp, strike fast, react faster - hostiles are on the move, and they will be expecting you.

Intense Gunfights


When the shooting starts, use every bit of firepower at your disposal. If you miss the target, they won't miss you. One bullet could be the difference between saving a teammate or failing the mission.

Equipment Is A Must


Join the fight with the right set of tools. More than 20 gadgets to distribute among your team and take the upper hand: heartbeat detector, door cams, door wedge, grenades...

Main Features

  • Tactical Pre-Planning: Scout routes, mark objectives, and set entry/exit points with an innovative top-down planning phase.
  • Realistic Combat: Engage in intense, precision-driven gunfights with limited ammo and no “spray and pray”.
  • Specialized Gear: Use tools like cameras, door stoppers, and breaching grenades to outsmart and outmaneuver enemies.
  • Dynamic Maps: Strategize across diverse, meticulously crafted environments with endless replayability.
  • Co-Op Teamwork: Coordinate with up to 3 friends, leveraging specialized roles and gadgets to execute perfect strategies.

Plan. Execute. Adapt. The mission is yours—are you ready?

content_descriptors.notes: Lots of shooting and killing with blood.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2500 or AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 660ti or AMD R9 270 with 2+ GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: Phantom Squad is an intense 1-4 player tactical top-down shooter combining fast-paced combat with real-time strategy. Assemble your squad, plan your route, choose your loadout, and execute. Use a versatile arsenal to tackle brutal missions; stick to the plan or adapt to survive the chaos
